entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 18. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
